text: Cinderella () is a 1960 Soviet musical movie directed by Rostislav Zakharov and Aleksandr Rou.ХРУСТАЛЬНЫЙ БАШМАЧОК (1960)ХРУСТАЛЬНЫЙ БАШМАЧОК It stars Raisa Struchkova, Gennadi Ledyakh, and Elena Vanke. The movie is a screen version by Sergei Prokofiev's Cinderella ballet. == Actors == * Raisa Struchkova as Cinderella * Gennadi Ledyakh * Elena Vanke * Lesma Chadarayn * Natalya Ryzhenko * Aleksandr Pavlinov * Yekaterina Maksimova == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1960 musical movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou
title: Cinderella (1960 movie)
